author: fielding
msg: mod_version needs to be compiled because the test framework requires it
(and the feature doesn't make much sense if it crashes httpd on test).

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-3971] Updating Ant-mojo support to provide the standard Maven classpath refs and plugin-style expression evaluation available in the antrun plugin. This depends on the newest (as-yet unreleased) maven-plugin-tools-ant to enable the new functionality, though it is still backward compatible. Ant-based plugins build using the plugin-tools-ant versions that are older will work, but won't have access to maven.compile.classpath, etc.

author: wsmoak
msg: [CONTINUUM-2073] Load userid, password, host, port and base url from the it.properties file.
